content: Alexander's unique ability to steal or borrow the powers of immortal enemies, combined with his training as a warrior and his natural strength as a demigod, makes him a formidable opponent. He is also protected by the favor of his mother Aphrodite, who uses her influence to keep him safe from harm. Additionally, Alexander's experiences as a veteran of war have taught him the importance of strategy and caution, allowing him to navigate dangerous situations with a level head. He also has a network of allies and friends that would help him in his quest. With his cunning and his ability to adapt, Alexander is able to survive despite being the enemy of many powerful monsters and demigods.
